review:
A very good product in reasonable price..  
Satisfied☺..!!

I brought this zeb-g31 mother board from lamington road on saturday 21-10-2017
for 1750 rs and after instaling it found out that the bios screen does not
appear and there is no display on the monitor only the cpu fan comes on when
the power is pressed the is no problem with the 1.8 ghz core2duo processor and
ram ive installed since both are working in my old intel g31 motherboard.will
go to the dealer and service centre today to see if anything can be done ?

This is the best product in this range I bought this in 2014 and again in 2017
both are working fine .  
  
The only drawback could be cheap plastic body for the price it's worth every
penny.  
  
Having said that in electronics it's all about your luck if the product
doesn't fit your expectation you are welcome to reject but this product
encouraged me to buy more Bajaj products which I did from oven microwave to
other stuff.

I had a heavy weight iron Box and did not believe in light weight iron Box.
But due to my age factor it was difficult for me to use it and so went for
this light weight Bajaj iron Box with much suspicion. But to my relief, it was
working great and easy to use. I will definitely recommend to others to buy
this. Simple, lightweight and efficient. I believed in Bajaj brand and it kept
its word. As usual Amazon delivered the product in good packing and right time
as said. Good product at reasonable price.

Very Bad product...

The design of iron is bad. In the middle of ironing, if you want to put it
idle standing on surface vertically, the swivel cord comes in between surface
and it is irritating. Often the iron falls as well.  
  
My iron stopped working in just 50 days.

The iron is pretty good considered to its price. Overall satisfactory. Serves
the purpose well. But the heating pallet was slightly defective at one corner.
But that won't bother much.  
Amazon's packaging was very bad. It might damage the product. Next time try to
improve your packaging.

Had an Issue after using the Iron Box for 6 Months It Stopped heating .Gave
the Complaint to Bajaj Customer Care .They Came on the Same  
Day and Serviced the iron Box and it is working Fine Now.It comes with 2 Year
Warranty.I am Totally Satisfied with the product.

I placed order for dry iron and got steam iron instead. Steam iron is leaking
and not at all usable. I went out of station after purchasing it, so didnt got
time to return this item in recommended time frame. Would not recommend any
one to go for this iron.

Delivery: Before tentative time  
Packing: was well packed with air pouches to avoid any damage  
Performance: Satisfactory  
  
Pros:- 1. Plastic Body  
2\. Automatic switch off on heating  
3\. Convenient regulator  
4\. Light weight  
5\. Good look  
  
Cons: 1. The edge is open and not covered with plastic or a covering and can
hurt if not taken care  
2\. Heating can get high very early so proper caution needs to be taken  
3\. Takes a lot of time to cool down  
  
Ideally I would give it 3.5 stars. I bought it in ₹601 so it was quite
affordable. I hope my review helps you. Happy Shopping  
Hit helpful if found this review enriching..!

review:
When I was thinking to buy the iron for my daily usage it important to dont
compromised with quality I searched a lots and found the few product which are
meeting the my exceptions,  
  
I had selected the top of them which is BAJAJ DX71000 i have been using this
product on daily since 31st Dec-17 and now i written the review so that i can
share my personal usage experience with you all,  
  
I found the below are few top key points which supports this product to buy as
advantages,  
  
= Non-stick coated golden colour sole plate, i have used on top power as well
but it not sticked with any kind of Clothes,  
= Super clean finish with pleasant aesthetics,  
= Cool touch body with comfortable hand grip you can use this from single hand
you will not need 2 hands to use it  
= Light weight and 360 degree swivel cord as you are getting the product which
is very reliable and light weight its very good option,  
= Thermal fuse for safety  
  
Finally for Disadvantages i didnt find anything till yet & i will update in
this review if i find anything in future till the time its my recommdated Iron
to buy without thinking anymore

The iron is very good at this price point, I got it at Rs. 628.The iron heats
very quickly and the Teflon coating is of very good quality. Also Amazon
delivery was very fast, giving this iron 4 star because I still don't know the
function of the green indicator, only the red one glows.

> quick one day delivery  
> Got original product as checked completely no scratches nothing with good
packing.  
> Got all the documents as in warranty card of 2years, manual and bill.  
> looks good on white gloss touch, good length of cord and has all the
features as it states in product description.  
> It instantly heats in less than a minute which is pretty much quick, and
cools easily soon after you finish using which is safe.  
> It is very light weight and comfy to use, got adjustable temperature levels
for different clothes and doesn't stick as it has non stick coated sole plate.  
> It has 1000w and 230v ~50Hz and good ironing for long hours  
> it has automatic off as soon as it reaches the desired level of heat, and
turns again for further use.  
  
Best for price best quality and overall a very good product, I recommend to go
for it..👍

Horrible Quality, it just gets overheated.. already burnt two of my favourite
tops. I would recommend to buy brands like philips or morphy richards rather
than going for such a sub-standard product.

First of all Amazon packing & 3 days delivery after ordering it was good.  
  
I got this product on a deal prize of 499rs, buyed it after reading some
reviews & went for the trusted indian brand bajaj & I'm quite happy buying it.  
  
Here are some pros & cons I found out.  
  
Pros:-  
1.Light in weight.  
2.It has nice design.  
3.Different temperature controls with indicators.  
4.Gold plated.  
5.Heating is quick.  
  
Cons:-  
1.After the use settling time is too high.  
2.It takes more time to reduce heat even after switched off.  
3.You have to put a lil pressure on the iron box while ironing it cause the
iron is light weight.  
  
For the prize i payed this product is total value for money & I'm satisfied.

I was purchased it from the Amazon.in. It got it at very reasonable cost as I
have grabbed it at the time of deals. It was delivered even before estimated
delivery date.  
  
The product looked very good interns of design and it is very light weight.  
  
It will get heated within very less time. The temperature of the iron can be
adjusted as per according to type of clothes. It has very good performance. it
is flexibility to use. it has cool touch body with comfort handling. It is
very easy to use it also consumes very less amount of current. it was very
much worth able for the price. I liked it very much which made my clothes look
beautiful. As I was using this iron box since 1 year I never felt upset for
using this. very good product from the BAJAJ. I liked to recommend this
product for anyone looking to purchase good iron box at reasonable price.

This dry iron comes with a non-stick coating which facilitates its easy
gliding on all kinds of fabric. This non-stick coating ensures that the fabric
doesn’t stick and get torn due to excessive heat.  
The double indicator system in this Bajaj DX7 dry iron has been smartly
designed to ensure additional safety and convenience. The red light gleams
when the sole plate is heated and when the desired temperature is reached,
green light glows.

Excellent.  
Though Iron is light in weight, ironing is satisfactory.  
The heating is quick.  
Quick delivery.satisfied.

This is my second iron from Bajaj. Was quite happy with the Bajaj iron product
which I used earlier. It was working for around 5 years without any issues,
from last week it didn't get heated. So thought of buying an iron box and
searched for the same product in Amazon and found it. Without any second
thought, I just ordered the product under lightning deal. Very happy that I
saved few pennies.

review:
It's a good product at this price. It's heat up so quickly. Only con is the
packaging. It's look like broken box inside.

Looking to buy an affordable and modern looking iron with all the basic
features you need to get the job done? Look no further than the Bajaj DX7 Dry
Iron is a very economical option with a trendy look and neat features. Bajaj
has been a trusted and reputed brand for electronics for years and years and
gives a two year warranty for this product. Grab this great iron at a super
low price.  
  
Non-Stick Coated Sole Plate  
  
The Bajaj DX7 Dry Iron has a non-stick coated soleplate which ensures that
your clothes do not stick to it even if there is any overheating in the iron.
It also allows the iron to glide smoothly along the fabric and makes your job
a lot less stressful.  
  
Thermal Fuse  
  
This iron has a thermal fuse which controls the amount of heat being supplied
to the plate and shuts of the electric circuit in case of too much heat. This
prevents damage to the iron and assures your safety while using the iron.  
  
360 Degree Swivel Cord  
  
This iron with 360 degree swivel cord is very easy to use as it allows you to
move the iron in all directions and get at all those tough spots on your
garment. This handy feature makes the work a lot lighter on your wrists and
hand for longer periods of ironing. It also makes it easier to store the iron
away in standing position so it takes up less space.  
  
Lightweight  
  
This lightweight iron is easy to handle and comfortable to use. The Bajaj DX7
Dry Iron weighs a mere 789 gms and is perfect to carry along with you on
holiday so you can neatly press clothes wherever you go!  
  
Other Paramount Features  
  
The Bajaj DX7 Dry Iron has a unique cool touch body which insulates the iron
within the chamber so it does not get too hot to hold. The ergonomically
designed handle makes sure you have a comfortable and effortless ironing
session every time.



One of the best in this price segments.

Hi, I am Sayantani going to review this iron after more than 1 year of using.
Basically me and my boyfriend have chosen this to gift to my mom as a birthday
gift. We bought it on offer. Honestly in this price compared to other brands
this is better. Coming to the product description I would like to mention two
best points about the product.  
  
1\. It has two indicator light one is red and one is green. The use of the
lights are as follows:  
  
Red : This light is for understanding that if the iron is completely hot. Once
the heating will complete the green light will indicate that the iron box is
ready for use.  
  
Green light: To understand that if the iron box is completely hot and ready
for use.  
  
2\. Warranty: 2years  
  
3\. You can set mode to iron different type of clothes. There is a wheel for
changing the mode for different product. You can opt for Linen, cotton etc are
the modes.  
  
4\. The product is made of plastic and the ironing plate is made of non-stick
coated golden colour sole plate.  
  
5\. Power required : Power: 1000 watts and Operating voltage: 230 volts

Good Product with such Price

Useless product. It didn't even work for four months. Please don't buy this
